Included page: .HuntTheWumpus.SetUp (edit)

Import
Fitnesse

HuntTheWumpusContext



variable defined: TEST_SYSTEM=slim
classpath: ./WumpusGame/bin

Import
Fitnesse

Start Game

Testing the functionality of starting a game

script Start Game
check welcomeMessage [Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!! you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?] expected [Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!\n\nDo you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?]
check userInputY [Rules for Hunt the Wumpus: 1. You can move North (w), South (s), East (a), or West (d) using the aswd letter keys 2. Your goal is to kill the Wumpus with one of your arrows. The Wumpus walks around the caverns randomly. If the Wumpus is one cavern away from you, you can smell the Wumpus (he smells really bad...) If the Wumpus walks into you or you walk into the Wumpus, then you DIE. 3. You start with 5 arrows. You shoot them using the arrow keys on your keyboard. An arrow continues in the direction it was shot until it hits a wall or other object. If you walk into a cavern with a dropped arrow, you automatically pick it up. You only have 5 arrows after all. If you shoot an arrow into a wall directly next to you, you will DIE. 4. There are Bats in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with bats, you will be flown to random location. If you shoot an arrow and it lands in a bat cavern, the arrow will kill the bats, and you can then retrieve it. If you are one cavern away from bats, you will hear screaching noises. 5. There are Pits in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with pits, you will fall into the pit and DIE. If you shoot an arrow and it flies over a pit, the arrow will fall down the pit, and you will be unable to reclaim it. If you are one cavern away from a pit, you will hear blustering wind. GOOD LUCK!!! ] expected [rules]
check userInputYEnterGameStart true


script Start Game
check welcomeMessage [Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!! you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?] expected [welcome]
check userInputNGameEnds true

instructionResult.slimResult:
fail(a=Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!
you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?;e=Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!\n\nDo you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?)

expectation.actual:
Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!
you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?
expectation.expected: Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!\n\nDo you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?

instructionResult.slimResult:
fail(a=Rules for Hunt the Wumpus: 1. You can move North (w), South (s), East (a), or West (d) using the aswd letter keys
2. Your goal is to kill the Wumpus with one of your arrows. The Wumpus walks around the caverns randomly. If the Wumpus is one cavern away from you, you can smell the Wumpus (he smells really bad...) If the Wumpus walks into you or you walk into the Wumpus, then you DIE.
3. You start with 5 arrows. You shoot them using the arrow keys on your keyboard. An arrow continues in the direction it was shot until it hits a wall or other object. If you walk into a cavern with a dropped arrow, you automatically pick it up. You only have 5 arrows after all. If you shoot an arrow into a wall directly next to you, you will DIE.
4. There are Bats in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with bats, you will be flown to random location. If you shoot an arrow and it lands in a bat cavern, the arrow will kill the bats, and you can then retrieve it. If you are one cavern away from bats, you will hear screaching noises.
5. There are Pits in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with pits, you will fall into the pit and DIE. If you shoot an arrow and it flies over a pit, the arrow will fall down the pit, and you will be unable to reclaim it. If you are one cavern away from a pit, you will hear blustering wind.
GOOD LUCK!!! ;e=rules)

expectation.actual:
Rules for Hunt the Wumpus: 1. You can move North (w), South (s), East (a), or West (d) using the aswd letter keys
2. Your goal is to kill the Wumpus with one of your arrows. The Wumpus walks around the caverns randomly. If the Wumpus is one cavern away from you, you can smell the Wumpus (he smells really bad...) If the Wumpus walks into you or you walk into the Wumpus, then you DIE.
3. You start with 5 arrows. You shoot them using the arrow keys on your keyboard. An arrow continues in the direction it was shot until it hits a wall or other object. If you walk into a cavern with a dropped arrow, you automatically pick it up. You only have 5 arrows after all. If you shoot an arrow into a wall directly next to you, you will DIE.
4. There are Bats in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with bats, you will be flown to random location. If you shoot an arrow and it lands in a bat cavern, the arrow will kill the bats, and you can then retrieve it. If you are one cavern away from bats, you will hear screaching noises.
5. There are Pits in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with pits, you will fall into the pit and DIE. If you shoot an arrow and it flies over a pit, the arrow will fall down the pit, and you will be unable to reclaim it. If you are one cavern away from a pit, you will hear blustering wind.
GOOD LUCK!!!

instructionResult.slimResult:
fail(a=Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!
you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?;e=welcome)

expectation.actual:
Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!
you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?

executionLog.stdOut:
Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!
you wish to continue to the game (y/n)? Do you wish to continue to the game (y/n)? Rules for Hunt the Wumpus: 1. You can move North (w), South (s), East (a), or West (d) using the aswd letter keys
2. Your goal is to kill the Wumpus with one of your arrows. The Wumpus walks around the caverns randomly. If the Wumpus is one cavern away from you, you can smell the Wumpus (he smells really bad...) If the Wumpus walks into you or you walk into the Wumpus, then you DIE.
3. You start with 5 arrows. You shoot them using the arrow keys on your keyboard. An arrow continues in the direction it was shot until it hits a wall or other object. If you walk into a cavern with a dropped arrow, you automatically pick it up. You only have 5 arrows after all. If you shoot an arrow into a wall directly next to you, you will DIE.
4. There are Bats in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with bats, you will be flown to random location. If you shoot an arrow and it lands in a bat cavern, the arrow will kill the bats, and you can then retrieve it. If you are one cavern away from bats, you will hear screaching noises.
5. There are Pits in these caverns... If you walk into a cavern with pits, you will fall into the pit and DIE. If you shoot an arrow and it flies over a pit, the arrow will fall down the pit, and you will be unable to reclaim it. If you are one cavern away from a pit, you will hear blustering wind.
GOOD LUCK!!!
Welcome to Hunt The Wumpus!!
you wish to continue to the game (y/n)? Do you wish to continue to the game (y/n)?
